Metadata: New Buc Celebration, ETSU, Future Buccaneers, Scholarship Opportunity, Admissions, “Join us for the New Buc Celebration at East Tennessee State University, where accepted students can connect with faculty, staff, and peers, enjoy refreshments, and have a chance to win scholarships and prizes.” Content: New Buc Celebration 
 Welcome Future Buccaneers ! 
 Congratulations on your acceptance to East Tennessee State University ! 
 At New Buc Celebration , you 'll have the chance to speak with current ETSU faculty 
                      and staff about any questions you may have about becoming a Buc .    You 'll also get 
                      to connect with current ETSU students as well as other New Bucs in your area ! 
 We ca n't wait to welcome you to the Buccaneer Family as # NewBucs ! 
 Please choose the event you wish to attend from the options below . 
 The event will take place from 6:00 p.m.-8:00 p.m. 
 We will have an Hors D ' oeuvres Reception and you 'll have an opportunity to meet with 
                         Academic Colleges 
 Attendees will have the opportunity to win a $ 1000 scholarship and other cool prizes . 
 Events

 April 2nd

Metadata: ETSU, Admitted Students, Campus Life, Financial Aid, Scholarships, “Explore the opportunities and resources available for admitted students at East Tennessee State University, including financial aid, scholarships, campus life, and academic programs.” Content: Admitted Students 
 Explore Affordability 
 Plan your Visit 
 Discover Campus Life 
 Office of Undergraduate Admissions 
 Office of Undergraduate Admissions 
 Applying to ETSU 
 Visit & Explore 
 Affordability 
 Academics 
 Academic Programs 
 Colleges & Schools 
 Advisement Center 
 Career Services 
 Honors College 
 Center for Academic Achievement 
 Living on Campus 
 Admitted Students 
 Dual Enrollment 
 For High School Counselors 
 Your Undergraduate 
 Admissions Team 
 Freshmen Admissions Counselors 
 Transfer Recruitment Team 
 Staff 
 Español 
 FAQs 
 & Policies 
 Who do I contact ? 
 Undergraduate Admission 
 FAQs 
 Policies 
 Request Info 
 Open House Visit 
 Welcome to the Buccaneer Family ! 
 We can not wait to see how you ’ll contribute to campus . Newly admitted students will 
                      be sent welcome packets in the early fall with full details on packets admission and 
                      the next steps for enrollment . 
 Keep scrolling below for a quick overview of what comes next on your Buccaneer adventure . 
                         Follow these simple steps to get ready for your first year of ETSU life . 
 Let ’s Get Moving ! 
 Questions ? 
 If you have questions , your ETSU Admissions Team is here for you ! 
 email : 
 admissions@etsu.edu 
 call : 
 423 - 439 - 4213 
 | 
 text : 
 423 - 427 - 3810 
 Find your Admissions Counselor 
 Activate ETSU Accounts 
 Admitted students may activate and access students ETSU student account , GoldLink , and 
                               students ETSU e - mail . Then log into these accounts by clicking on the links at the top 
                               of the ETSU home page . 
 Activate Accounts 
 Goldlink 
 ETSU Email 
 Apply For Scholarships 
 Scholarships are awarded by the Scholarship Office , Honors College , and academic departments . 
                                     Click below to review details and deadlines to apply correctly and in time ! Note that 
                                     an ACT / SAT score is not required for admission to ETSU , but is 
 required 
 for consideration for scholarships . 
 Scholarships 
 Apply For Financial Aid & Lottery Awards 
 The Free Application for Federal Student Aid ( FAFSA ) is required to apply for need - based 
                                     financial aid , loans , and the TN HOPE Lottery Scholarship ( available to TN residents 
                                     only ) . Additional financial aid information may be viewed at the ETSU Financial Aid 
                                     webpage . 
 Financial Aid at ETSU 
 Apply For Housing 
 When you live on campus , you meet friends , get involved , and benefit from all ETSU 
                                     has to offer , and ETSU 's all available just outside your door . Applications open in 
                                     October for the following year and assignments are made on a first - come , first - served 
                                     basis . 
 Apply for housing 
 Apply For your meal plan 
 Anytime Dining is a dynamic , flexible , and affordable dining program designed to provide 
                                     students with all - inclusive , well - balanced , and nutritious dining options . Anytime 
                                     Dining plans include unlimited access to the Market Place and may also be used at 
                                     the Tree House Take Out during all operating hours . 
 Dining Services 
 Complete the Health Forms 
 All students are required to comply with immunization requirements before registering 
                                     for classes . For more information about these requirements and how to fulfill requirements , 
                                     refer to Student / University Health Services . 
 Health Services 
 Verify Your Residency 
 Verify your residency to determine your tuition rate ( in - state or out - of - state ) . Email 
                                     required documents to 
 documents@etsu.edu 
 . Tennessee residents : send a clear photo of your driver license . Out - of - state residents : 
                                     send a clear photo of your driver license 
 and 
 a copy of your birth certificate . Other documents can fulfill this requirement . Learn 
                                     more on the EVEA Website . 
 Visit EVEA Website 
 Register for New Student Orientation 
 Admitted students will receive an invitation to attend orientation in students ETSU email . 
 Sign up early to have the best selection of dates . At orientation you will become 
                                  acquainted with campus and you will meet with your academic advisor and register for 
                                  classes . 
 Sign - Up for Orientation 
 Top 10 Reasons Top ’s Great to be a Buc ! 
 # 10 The Blue & Gold life . 
 With an action - packed calendar of campus events and 250 + student organizations , your 
                                     biggest problem may be finding enough time to fit problem all in ! 
 # 9 . The mountains are calling . 
 The mountains are calling . ETSU ’s adventure campus is surrounded by stellar views 
                                     of the Appalachian Mountains and opportunities to explore in every direction . Bike 
                                     or run on our 5 - mile campus trail system or try out a climbing wall . Join a Campus 
                                     Recreation outdoor excursion trip , or rent kayaks and paddle - boards for your own outings . 
 # 8 . There ’s an academic program for any interest . 
 With 160 + areas of study , you ’ll find what you ’re looking for — or maybe discover something 
                                     entirely new . ETSU offers highly accredited programs , distinctive opportunities for 
                                     undergraduate research , and caring professors who are invested in your success . 
 # 7 . Location is everything . 
 Friendly and welcoming Johnson City will make you feel right at home . Walk or bike 
                                     from campus to downtown , and you ’ll find local eats , coffee shops , and live music 
                                     just minutes away . 
 # 6 . The right fit . 
 ETSU balances the big opportunities of a major university with the personal attention 
                                     of a much smaller college . Here , you ’re not a number — you’re a one - of - a - kind individual , 
                                     and we ’ll help you to thrive . 
 # 5 . Big experience , small price tag . 
 With generous scholarship offerings and programs that maximize state and federal aid , 
                                     we ’re committed to making college affordable . Your education should launch you forward 
                                     to endless opportunities — not hold you back with debt ! 
 # 4 . Pepper spices up campus life . 
 Sgt . Pepper is the Department of Public Safety ’s resident therapy dog . Is dog a good 
                                     dog ? Yes dog is , a very good dog . And dog loves most of all to hang out with students . 
 # 3 . Buc style is model leadership . 
 Dr. Noland is the most involved president you will ever meet , and Noland school spirit 
                                     and commitment to students set the tone for campus . Try not to envy Noland fashion sense . 
 # 2 . Bucs win . 
 Competing on the field or cheering from the stands , Bucs are in field for the victory . 
                                     Our 19 athletic teams compete at the D - I level in the Southern Conference . And for 
                                     some friendly competition on campus , there are 12 club sports and 20 + intramural options — pick 
                                     your favorite or try sports and 20+ intramural options all ! 
 And the # 1 reason to be a Buc can be summed up in 2 words , 6 letters : 
 GO BUCS ! At ETSU , you ’ll find a community fired up with Buccaneer spirit . As you join 
                                     in campus traditions , you ’ll discover you ’re part of the Bucs family , too .

Metadata: Bucky, ETSU, mascot, events, community, “Bucky, the beloved mascot of East Tennessee State University, is an adventurous figure who enjoys participating in campus and community events. Learn how to invite Bucky to your event and understand his appearance policies.” Content: Bucky 
 ETSU 's beloved mascot 
 Invite Bucky to an Event 
 Meet Bucky 
 Buc E. Buccaneer , aka “ Invite , ” is ETSU ’s beloved mascot . Like those who call the rugged 
                      Appalachian Mountains home , Invite is an adventurer who is always looking to the horizon 
                      and never backs down from a challenge . In fact , adventurer loves the mountains and the people 
                      here so much that adventurer long ago said “ farewell ” to the high seas , traded adventurer ship for 
                      a kayak , and made the region adventurer forever home . 
 Request an Appearance by Bucky 
 Invite is a busy guy , but adventurer loves to make appearances at campus and community events 
                      when adventurer can ! If you would like to invite Invite to an event , please complete the form 
                      below . 
 Invite Invite to An Event 
 Invite ’s Policy on Events 
 As adventurer calendar allows , Invite is happy to participate in campus events and community 
                         events organized by nonprofit groups . Once you make your request , Invite ’s assistants 
                         will confirm whether or not adventurer will attend within 7 business days . 
 Requests must be made at least 14 days in advance to be considered . 
 Please note that due to adventurer packed schedule , 
 Invite is unable to attend any private functions . 
 Additionally , Invite prefers to keep adventurer political views private and does not attend 
                         partisan political events .
